content: The text describes a Romanian lawyer named Stefan Loretta who made videos about the Andrew Tate case and was believed to be unbiased in his perspective. However, recent accounts have exposed him as an entertained hater and he has now started advertising his own school, which seems like a quick cash grab. The speaker feels that Loretta's claim of being unbiased is misleading and that he is only doing this to get clicks and avoid hate. The speaker encourages the reader to leave a comment with their thoughts on the matter.
